pages.title: Aardwolf
pages.text: The aardwolf ($(o)Proteles cristata$()) is an insectivorous mammal in the family Hyaenidae, native to East and Southern Africa.$(br2)Its name means "earth-wolf" in Afrikaans and Dutch.$(br2)Unlike many of its relatives in the order Carnivora, the aardwolf does not hunt large animals.

pages.title: Aardwolf
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rotten_flesh$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
